title: VA - Phat Trax, Vol.2 (The Best Of Old School)@320
description:
Disco and funk combine on Phat Trax: The Best of Old School, Vol. 2, which pays tribute to the sounds that inspired hip-hop. Rolling, voluptuous basslines, uptight guitars, and vibrant brass sections drive tracks like Funkadelic&#039;s "One Nation Under a Groove," Fatback&#039;s "Backstrokin&#039;," and Tom Browne&#039;s "Thighs High (Grip Your Hips and Move)," bridging the gap between funk and disco and providing countless rap and hip-hop artists ample material for sampling. Sun&#039;s "Sun Is Here," Faze-O&#039;s "Riding High," and T.S. Monk&#039;s "Bon Bon Vie" are among the other highlights of this funky, stylish compilation, which also documents just how integral these songs were to hip-hop&#039;s development. (AMG)



01. Funkadelic - One Nation Under A Groove                                                                         
02. Fatback - Backstrokin&#039;                                                                                         
03. Tom Browne - Thighs High (Grip Your Hips And Move)                                                             
04. Sun - Sun Is Here                                                                                              
05. Faze-O - Riding High                                                                                           
06. One Way - Pull Fancy Dancer Pull                                                                               
07. T. S. Monk - Bon Bon Vie                                                                                       
08. Brick - Dusic                                                                                                  
09. The Female Preacher, Lyn Collins - Momma Feel Good                                                             
10. The Meters - Cissy Strut


Label: Rhino
Date: 1994

BITRATE: 320
